content_elements.current_text: iPhone 16 Pro

slideLayouts.layout_description: 幻灯片包含一个顶部标题区域和一个下方的项目符号列表区域，标题和列表分别突出显示，背景由绿色几何图形构成。

content_elements.current_text: iPhone 16 Pro

Trade-In and Pricing: Receive $180–$650 credit towards iPhone 16 Pro when trading in an iPhone 12 or newer.
◦ Design and Durability: Grade 5 titanium design with microblasted texture, available in four finishes including Desert Titanium.
◦ Display and Camera: New Super Retina XDR displays with 48MP Ultra Wide and 5x Telephoto cameras.
◦ Performance and Battery: Up to 27 hours video playback.
◦ Additional Features: Advanced Apple Intelligence, enhanced accessibility, environmental and ethical considerations.

slideLayouts.layout_description: 幻灯片包含一张清晰的产品图片，位于页面上部，以及两个文本框，分别位于图片下方。整体结构清晰，用于展示产品特性。

content_elements.current_text: Design and Durability
The iPhone 16 Pro features a Grade 5 titanium design with a microblasted texture, combining strength with a lightweight build.
Available in four finishes, including the new Desert Titanium, the iPhone 16 Pro is splash, water, and dust resistant, and comes with the latest-generation Ceramic Shield for enhanced durability.

slideLayouts.layout_description: 页面上部为科技感十足的手机图片展示，中部有标题「Display and Camera Features」，下方为详细的产品特性描述。

content_elements.current_text: Display and Camera Features

New display technology offers thinner borders and larger 6.3-inch and 6.9-inch Super Retina XDR displays, providing an immersive viewing experience.
The 48MP Ultra Wide camera captures high-resolution photos and videos with advanced features like autofocus and ProRAW support. The 5x Telephoto camera provides sharper close-ups, even from a distance.

slideLayouts.layout_description: 页面左侧展示手机屏幕截图，右侧上方有品牌标识和几何图案装饰，下方为两段详细的文本描述，整体布局清晰，图文并茂。

content_elements.current_text: Apple Intelligence: Personal and Private

Apple Intelligence is a personal intelligence system that assists in writing, self-expression, and task completion. It is designed with privacy at its core, ensuring your data is safe and private at every step.
Features include on-device processing and Private Cloud Compute, which keep your data secure and private. Enjoy the benefits of advanced AI without compromising your personal information.

slideLayouts.layout_description: 页面左侧为大尺寸图片，右侧为产品特性说明，包括标题和多段文字描述，布局清晰，适合展示产品功能与细节。

content_elements.current_text: A18 Pro chip. The brains behind
Performance and Battery Life

The A18 Pro chip features a faster Neural Engine, improved CPU and GPU, and increased memory bandwidth. It offers advanced video and photo capabilities, the best graphics performance for gaming, and hardware-accelerated ray tracing in iOS 18.

The iPhone 16 Pro provides extended battery life, with the Pro Max model offering up to 33 hours of video playback. Fast wireless charging supports up to 25W using a 30W power adapter, allowing up to 50% charge in approximately 30 minutes.

slideLayouts.layout_description: 页面包含一个位于顶部的大标题和下方的多个项目符号列表，适用于展示产品特性或功能介绍。右侧有几何图形装饰。

content_elements.current_text: Additional Features and Accessibility

Satellite Connectivity: Stay connected in remote areas.

Privacy and Security: Secure your data with end-to-end encryption.
Accessibility: Features for all users, including Eye Tracking and Music Haptics.
Satellite SOS: Text emergency services when cell service is unavailable.
Vocal Shortcuts: Voice commands to enhance usability.

slideLayouts.layout_description: 页面顶部为大标题，下方为多个项目符号列表，用于突出要点。

content_elements.current_text: Environmental and Ethical Considerations

content_elements.position: 页面中部偏下，以项目符号形式展示
content_elements.current_text:
All Apple data centers run on 100% renewable energy.

The iPhone 16 Pro uses over 95% recycled lithium in the battery, 100% recycled gold in the USB-C connector, and 100% recycled copper in the MagSafe charger.
Packaging is 100% fiber-based and thinner, reducing carbon impact for shipping.
Apple prioritizes ethical practices with the use of recycled materials and sustainable packaging.
Privacy and security are paramount, ensuring user data is protected and inaccessible to anyone, including Apple.

slideLayouts.layout_description: 页面上部有较大标题区域，下部有项目符号列表区域，内容为结束语和联系信息，右上角有绿色几何图形装饰。

content_elements.current_text: Thank You for Joining Us

We hope you enjoyed learning about the iPhone 16 Pro.
